ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Newbie Bard needs hunting suggestions
ygData.msgSnippet: ... well, erm, I always have a hand on the mouse unless I am saying something. I use it to look/navigate (rclick) and target(lclick). All my hotkeys and macros
ygData.messageBody:
> How often do you actually use the mouse while playing a bard?
> I mean other
> than swapping instruments, as that is a very short distance
> for a mouse to
> travel and even a lagging mouse can hack it.


well, erm, I always have a hand on the mouse unless I am saying something. I
use it to look/navigate (rclick) and target(lclick). All my hotkeys and
macros forward/backward/strafe are triggered with my left hand. And
instrument/weapon swapping of course, which I do a LOT. A gunky mouse when
you are switching from weapons to drum with less than a bub of health can
mean death! :o)

Tszaaz
